graphQLQueries.random: query randomQuestion($categorySlug: String, $filters: QuestionListFilterInput){randomQuestion(categorySlug: $categorySlug, filters: $filters){questionId  title titleSlug difficulty categoryTitle isPaidOnly likes dislikes stats topicTags{name}}}
graphQLQueries.specific: query questionData($titleSlug: String!){question(titleSlug: $titleSlug){questionId  title titleSlug difficulty categoryTitle isPaidOnly likes dislikes stats topicTags{name}}}
